articles.description: Liverpool's perfect mix and match of Jurgen Klopp's heavy metal and Arne Slot's symphony destroyed Manchester City, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Liverpool 2-0 Man City: How Reds combined best of Arne Slot & Jurgen Klopp to win

articles.description: Max Verstappen says he has "lost all respect" for George Russell over his role in a penalty the world champion received at the Qatar Grand Prix.
articles.title: Max Verstappen says he has 'lost all respect' for George Russell

articles.description: Judd Trump claims his second UK Championship title with a hard-fought 10-8 victory over Barry Hawkins at the Barbican in York.
articles.title: UK Championship final: Judd Trump beats Barry Hawkins 10-8 to win second UK title

articles.description: Fiorentina midfielder Edoardo Bove collapsed and taken to hospital as a Serie A match against Inter Milan was suspended on Sunday.
articles.title: Fiorentina 0-0 Inter Milan: Match suspended after midfielder Edoardo Bove collapses

articles.description: The verdict in Nikita Hand's civil rape case saw already dwindling support for the UFC star fall further.
articles.title: Conor McGregor: Nikita Hand verdict prompts seismic shift in support

articles.description: Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola says he did not expect to hear 'sacked in the morning' chants directed towards him at Anfield.
articles.title: Pep Guardiola: Liverpool fans chant 'sacked in the morning' at Man City boss

articles.description: Olympic champions Letsile Tebogo and Sifan Hassan are named male and female athlete of the year at the World Athletics Awards.
articles.title: World Athletic Awards: Letsile Tebogo and Sifan Hassan named athletes of the year

articles.description: Former world snooker champion Terry Griffiths has died aged 77, the World Snooker Tour has confirmed.
articles.title: Terry Griffiths: Former world snooker champion dies aged 77

articles.description: Manchester United are unbeaten under Ruben Amorim, so has the Portuguese boss brought back the feel-good factor at Old Trafford?
articles.title: Man Utd 4-0 Everton: Has Ruben Amorim brought back feel-good factor?

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Real Madrid vs Getafe in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Real Madrid vs Getafe: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
